headline.main: NYC Police Boss Pitches Amnesty Idea to Clear 1.2M Warrants
headline.print_headline: NYC Police Boss Pitches Amnesty Idea to Clear 1.2M Warrants

docs.snippet: New York City's police commissioner is floating the idea of using an amnesty program to resolve the 1.2 million open arrest warrants for low-level offenses....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York City's police commissioner is floating the idea of using an amnesty program to resolve the 1.2 million open arrest warrants for low-level offenses.

headline.main: Contador Clings to Giro Lead, Tiralongo Wins Stage
headline.print_headline: Contador Clings to Giro Lead, Tiralongo Wins Stage

docs.snippet: Alberto Contador clung on to the overall lead of the Giro d'Italia despite being outsprinted by his closest rival Fabio Aru at the end of a hilly ninth stage on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador clung on to the overall lead of the Giro d'Italia despite being outsprinted by his closest rival Fabio Aru at the end of a hilly ninth stage on Sunday.

headline.main: Young Guns Ingolstadt Win First Bundesliga Promotion
headline.print_headline: Young Guns Ingolstadt Win First Bundesliga Promotion

docs.snippet: Little-known Ingolstadt secured their first ever promotion to the Bundesliga on Sunday after beating RB Leipzig 2-1 for the biggest achievement in their short 11-year history....
docs.lead_paragraph: Little-known Ingolstadt secured their first ever promotion to the Bundesliga on Sunday after beating RB Leipzig 2-1 for the biggest achievement in their short 11-year history.

headline.main: James Morrison of England Wins Spanish Open by 4 Shots
headline.print_headline: James Morrison of England Wins Spanish Open by 4 Shots

docs.snippet: James Morrison of England won the Spanish Open by four shots shooting a 3-under 69 in Sunday's final round....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Morrison of England won the Spanish Open by four shots shooting a 3-under 69 in Sunday's final round.

headline.main: Man Who Scammed NHL in 1990s Faces Another Ohio Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Man Who Scammed NHL in 1990s Faces Another Ohio Fraud Case

docs.snippet: An Ohio man who became infamous in the 1990s for his fraudulent attempt to buy the National Hockey League's New York Islanders is scheduled to go on trial Monday outside of Cleveland on theft and forgery charges....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Ohio man who became infamous in the 1990s for his fraudulent attempt to buy the National Hockey League's New York Islanders is scheduled to go on trial Monday outside of Cleveland on theft and forgery charges.

headline.main: States Help Get Heroin Antidote Into Hands of Regular Folks

docs.snippet: Narcan is not just for police and first responders anymore....

headline.main: Texas Man Dies in Paraglider Crash in Northern New Mexico
headline.print_headline: Texas Man Dies in Paraglider Crash in Northern New Mexico

docs.snippet: Authorities say a Texas man is dead after his paraglider crashed outside a northern New Mexico airport....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a Texas man is dead after his paraglider crashed outside a northern New Mexico airport.

headline.main: Pope Francis canonizes two Palestinian women
headline.sub: Pope Francis canonizes two Palestinian women

docs.snippet: Pope Francis named two Palestinian women as saints, in a ceremony in Saint Peter's Square just days after the Vatican formalized its de facto recognition of the State of Palestine. Pavithra George reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis named two Palestinian women as saints, in a ceremony in Saint Peter's Square just days after the Vatican formalized its de facto recognition of the State of Palestine. Pavithra George reports.

headline.main: Jacksonville Mayoral Race Draws National Political Interest
headline.print_headline: Jacksonville Mayoral Race Draws National Political Interest

docs.snippet: There's a reason why the Jacksonville mayoral race is drawing the attention of outsiders like former President Bill Clinton, former Texas Gov. Rick Perry, former Gov. Jeb Bush and U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio and it's about more than who wins on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: There's a reason why the Jacksonville mayoral race is drawing the attention of outsiders like former President Bill Clinton, former Texas Gov. Rick Perry, former Gov. Jeb Bush and U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio and it's about more than who wins on Tuesday.

headline.main: 'Pitch Perfect 2' Races Past 'Mad Max: Fury Road' With Outstanding $70.3 Million
headline.print_headline: 'Pitch Perfect 2' Races Past 'Mad Max: Fury Road' With Outstanding $70.3 Million

docs.snippet: "Pitch Perfect 2" hit all the right notes at the box office, snagging first place on the charts with a smashing $70.3 million debut despite fierce competition from "Mad Max: Fury Road."...
docs.lead_paragraph: "Pitch Perfect 2" hit all the right notes at the box office, snagging first place on the charts with a smashing $70.3 million debut despite fierce competition from "Mad Max: Fury Road."
